pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, December 18, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a year-end roundtable interview with The Canadian Press / La Presse Canadienne.

West Block
Parliament Hill

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet the Prime Minister of Saint Lucia, Allen Chastanet.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to gather in the third floor foyer no later than 3:15 p.m.
